alert.note: Alert for Washington (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 22 at 2:48PM EST until February 26 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Charleston WV has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Ohio... Muskingum River At Beverly affecting Washington County. For the Muskingum River...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING TO EARLY SATURDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Muskingum River At Beverly. * WHEN...From this evening to early Saturday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 29.0 feet, Low areas, and farmland, camps, and a few homes are flooded. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1:45 PM EST Tuesday the stage was 27.4 feet. - Forecast...The river will rise above flood stage late this evening to 29.5 feet tomorrow morning. It will then fall below flood stage tomorrow evening to 28.2 feet and begin rising again early Friday morning. It will rise above flood stage again Friday evening and continue to rise to 29.1 feet early Saturday morning. It will then fall below flood stage again Saturday morning. - Flood stage is 29.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 29.5 feet on 04/16/2018. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Report Severe Weather to the National Weather Service by calling toll free, 800 401 9535, when you can do so safely. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/rlx. The next statement will be issued late tonight at 300 AM EST.
